name: column1img
label: Image field
help_text: This field is the area where images are placed.

name: column1_title
label: 1column-title
help_text: This field is the area where you enter title.

name: column1_txt
label: column1-txt
help_text: This field is the area where you enter text.
default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

name: check_no_images
label: Check_no_images
help_text: When this is checked, the image is hidden.

name: column1_link
label: column1 link
help_text: This field is the area where you enter the link destination.

name: column1_link_txt
label: column1 link txt
help_text: This file is the area for entering the text of the link.

name: call_to_action_button
label: Call to Action button
help_text: When this is checked, the Call To Action button will be placed.
